an5.116:1.1: “Mendicants, a nun with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.116:1.3: Without examining or scrutinizing, she praises those deserving of criticism,
an5.116:1.4: and criticizes those deserving of praise.
an5.116:1.5: She arouses faith in things that are dubious,
an5.116:1.6: and doesn’t arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
an5.116:1.7: And she wastes gifts given in faith.
an5.116:1.8: A nun with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.116:2.1: A nun with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.116:2.3: After examining and scrutinizing, she criticizes those deserving of criticism,
an5.116:2.4: and praises those deserving of praise.
an5.116:2.5: She doesn’t arouse faith in things that are dubious,
an5.116:2.6: and does arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
an5.116:2.7: And she doesn’t waste gifts given in faith.
an5.116:2.8: A nun with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
